verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
To know Him, to know Him,
Is the cry of my heart.
The Spirit reveals him to me.

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
To hear what He's saying
Brings life to my soul.
To know Him, to know Him alone.

verse.name: c2a
verse.lines:
To know You, to know You,
Is the cry of my heart.
O Jesus, Your face now I see.

verse.name: c2b
verse.lines:
To hear what You're saying
Brings life to my soul.
To know You, to know You alone.

verse.name: c3a
verse.lines:
To know you to know you
Is the cry of our hearts
O Jesus Your face now we see

verse.name: c3b
verse.lines:
To hear what You're saying
brings life to our souls
To know You to know You alone

verse.name: c4a
verse.lines:
To serve you to serve you
Is the cry of our hearts
O Jesus Your face now we see

verse.name: c4b
verse.lines:
To hear what You're saying
brings life to our souls
To serve You to serve You alone
